node.text:
{{emote|*The urshiib pants, out-of-breath.*}}
Please, listen to me. You have to turn back...
node.choice: Who are you?
What do you mean?
I am not dealing with any of that. Live and drink.

node.text: Barathrumite... member of the expedition sent here. We didn't know... couldn't know...

choice.IfFinishedQuestStep: Save Who You Can Save~Talk to Hortensa

node.choice: The Barathrumite expedition? Hortensa sends me. What happened here?
Did not know what?

node.text:
{{emote|*The urshiib winces, rocking back and forth.*}}
... the stalks, they're everywhere! Everywhere! They got under my skin, I can feel them!
node.choice: You are going to be alright, please talk to me.
Pull yourself together! What happened?

node.text:
I'm sorry- I'm sorry- I'm sorry- I'm sorry- I'm sorry-
{{emote|*The urshiib wimpers.*}}
node.choice: Do not move, I will check on the village and be right back.
I will see for myself. Live and drink.
Hold on, I will get some help.
If you want to stay there, I cannot help you.

node.text: I do, brave friend. I'll imprint them now.

choice.CompleteQuestStep: Decoding the Signal~Get Q Girl's Instructions onto the Data Disk

node.choice: Thank you, Q Girl.

node.text: Before you go, Hortensa was looking for you earlier! Wonder what she wants now, quetzal!
node.choice: I will convene with her and let you know, Q Girl.

choice.IfNotFinishedQuestStep: Save Who You Can Save~Talk to Hortensa

start.choice: Q Girl said you were looking for me?

choice.IfFinishedQuestStep: Save Who You Can Save~Talk to Hortensa

start.choice: About the Barathrumite expedition to Nodd...

node.text: Indeed I was! There may be some work you can assist me with, should you find the time.
node.choice: Work you say?
Not now. live and drink.

node.text: Work indeed,=name=. Some weeks ago, an expedition of tinkers went to the village of Nodd on the edges of the Rainbow Wood, where some form of new fungal infection had been spotted. They ought to be back by now, but as you can see, there is no sign of them.
node.choice: Do you reckon something happened to them?
Do you want me investigate the matter?

node.text: I shudder to think of it, cub, but that may very well be the case. Would you check on them, please? I will hold some hope in my heart, but should the worst have arrived, I trust you to recover their expedition logs.

choice.CompleteQuestStep: Save Who You Can Save~Talk to Hortensa

node.choice: I will see what I can do, Hortensa. In the meantime, live and drink.

node.text: Is my worry that obvious? But yes, if that is not too much to ask, cub. Should their fate be as dire as I fear, would you recover their expedition logs?

choice.CompleteQuestStep: Save Who You Can Save~Talk to Hortensa

node.choice: I will see what I can do, Hortensa. In the meantime, live and drink.

choice.IfFinishedQuestStep: Save Who You Can Save~Determine the Fate of the the Barathrumite Expedition

node.choice: They succumbed to a new kind of fungal infection.
I will make my way there quickly. Live and drink, Hortensa.

node.text:
{{emote|*Hortensa's expression darkens.*}}
A dire fate indeed. What about the logs? Is there anything to glean from this tragedy?
node.choice: Hopefully there is. See for yourself.
I will retrieve them. Live and drink, Hortensa.

node.text:
{{emote|*Hortensa takes the data disk gingerly.*}}
You have my thanks, =name=. I will see what we can learn from this. In the meantime, please take my old hazard suit. It should help you in case of any more run-ins with fungi.

choice.CompleteQuestStep: Save Who You Can Save~Report Back to Hortensa
choice.text: Thank you Hortensa. Live and drink.

choice.CompleteQuestStep: Save Who You Can Save~Report Back to Hortensa
choice.text: That would have been useful earlier. Live and drink, Hortensa.
